page.title: 10TESTWOOD HOUSE (cont)
page.content: They have offices there and deal with bulk storage,bottling,warehousing and transport arrangements for the group.{Wine and Sherry is blended and {bottled here and as much as 250,000 {gallons are exported to Europe and {America each year.}The bonded warehouses and bottling halls are located behind the houses where extensions have been made without spoiling the 18th century facade and beautiful gardens.{60 people are {employed in the warehouses and 25 in {the offices.}150 years ago,a coachman brutally murdered a cook at Testwood House,and tried to hide her body in a pond at the end of Cooks Lane.{The {ghost of the man is said to haunt the {house and has been seen several times {especailly when the 20th of the Month {occurs on a Wednesday!!!. }
